channel.title: Utilities on Scott Larson
channel.description: Recent content in Utilities on Scott Larson

item.title: File Copy Transfer Utilities
item.description: When copying a lot of files, sometimes you need an advanced utility. This is a list of tools I use for my services. A good article on the history behind coping files in bulk and a tool that was created to meet that need. RichCopy – Microsoft’s Multi-Threaded File Copy Utility is a Windows copy utilities for IT professionals. Fab’s Autobackup utility is a good tool to migrate Windows account profile data from one computer to another.
